initialize(address[],uint256,address).details: Called once when the treasury is deployed for a campaign

params._campaign: The campaign address that can deposit funds
params._signers: Array of signer addresses (e.g., campaign creator + trusted parties)
params._threshold: Minimum number of approvals required to execute

approveTransaction(uint256).notice: Signer votes yes, increment approval count

executeTransaction(uint256).notice: If approvalCount >= threshold, execute the transaction

initialize(address[],uint256,address).notice: Initialize the treasury with signers and threshold

proposeTransaction(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Create a pending transaction, return txId
